user.title: FileFlows Integration Setup
user.description: Configure your FileFlows server connection. You can either provide a full URL or specify host and port separately.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this FileFlows integration
data_description.url: Full URL to FileFlows (e.g., http://192.168.1.18:8585) - Use this OR host/port
data_description.host: The IP address of your FileFlows server (e.g., 192.168.1.18) - Use this if not using URL
data_description.port: The port FileFlows is running on (default: 8585)
data_description.api_key: API key from FileFlows Settings > Security (if enabled)
data_description.scan_interval: How often to update data from FileFlows (seconds)
data_description.connected_last_seen_timespan: How long to consider nodes as connected (minutes)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to FileFlows server. Check URL/host and port.
error.invalid_host: Invalid host configuration or API error.

abort.already_configured: This FileFlows server is already configured.
